dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1256 IH: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in New Jersey.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. MacArthur introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in New Jersey.

section.header: Removal of properties in New Jersey from John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall revise one or more maps included in the set of maps entitled Coastal Barrier Resources System referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(a)) and relating to John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit NJâ€“04B in New Jersey, as necessary to remove from such system the properties located at the following postal addresses:

The Secretary of the Interior shall keep each map revised under subsection (a) on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(b)).
